init.title: Set up two-factor authentication using TOTP
init.description:
{qr_code}
`{code}`

1. Scan QR Code with your preferred authenticator app, such as [Google Authenticator](https://support.google.com/accounts/answer/1066447) or [Authy](https://authy.com/).
2. Enter the six digit code from your authenticator app:

error.invalid_code: Invalid code, please try again. If you get this error consistently, please make sure the clock of your Home Assistant system is accurate.

init.title: Set up one-time password delivered by notify component
init.description: Please select one of the notification services:

setup.title: Verify setup
setup.description: A one-time password has been sent via **notify.{notify_service}**. Please enter it below:

deprecated_legacy_api_password.title: The legacy API password is deprecated
deprecated_legacy_api_password.description: The legacy API password authentication provider is deprecated and will be removed. Please remove it from your YAML configuration and use the default Home Assistant authentication provider instead.
